title: Oh My Gosh
content:
Hey, I've made another music video with The Sims 2 using dance duo, Basement Jaxx's latest single 'Oh My Gosh'. You can watch it by clicking [url=http://www.sims99.com/movie_details.php?dir=sillygostly&id=657]here[/url].

You can also check out some of my other work while you're there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: Re: Oh My Gosh
content:
I love that song.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img]
Not bad work! Seems you've got good comments about the video. It was fun. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Oh My Gosh
content:
Downloading... Watching...
Nice job there [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Must have taken a while to synchronize the music with the characters, but the result is very successful.-------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson

title: Re: Oh My Gosh
content:
